messages.title: An election of firsts in Cardiff West
messages.content: It's time for a new voice in Cardiff West.

messages.title: Your voice in Wellington
messages.content: I am your Plaid Cymru candidate for Cardiff West and I am determined to be the strong Welsh voice that your community needs.

messages.title: Dear Elector
messages.content: It is a real possibility that no single party will win the 2015 UK general election. In this scenario the best electoral leverage for Wales must come from Wales.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Polisi Caredig yn Gymraeg - Putting Cardiff First
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I guarantee to speak out and act as a champion for local people.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Gwarchod ein Tiroedd Glas - Protect our Green Spaces
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Oppose Cardiff's Local Development Plan. No development beyond what the area can cope with.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Gwarchod ein Ceiniogau Prin - Make every Penny Count
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Why pay more than £200,000 to public servants? Help me stop the gravy train.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Gwarchod Plant a Rhieni - Protect Children and Parents
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Children should have the right to see both parents and both sets of grandparents.

housing.content: Oppose Cardiff's Local Development Plan. No development beyond what the area can cope with.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am determined to be the strong Welsh voice that your community needs.

contactInformation.address: Plaid Cymru, Freehold, Cowbridge Road East, Cardiff CF11 9AB

quotes.text: When Plaid wins, Wales is stronger. The stronger we are, the greater the influence Wales will have.

images.caption: Neil McEvoy - Plaid Cymru - Party of Wales - Cardiff West - Thursday 7 May 2015
